net.xuset.objectIO.util.broadcast

Class BroadcastServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.xuset.objectIO.util.broadcast.BroadcastServer

  • public class BroadcastServer
extends java.lang.Object
    This class continually sends message in a multicast datagram packet on the given port and address group.

    This class is generally used with BroadcastClient objects on other hosts. This class sends String messages that are picked up the BroadcastClient objects.

    Since:
    1.0
    See Also:
    BroadcastClient

    • Constructor Detail

      • BroadcastServer

        public BroadcastServer(int port,
               java.net.InetAddress group)
                throws java.net.SocketException
        Construct a new BroadcastServer with the given port and address group. To start the message send call start(String).
        Parameters:
        port - the port to broadcast on
        group - the multicast address to use
        Throws:
        java.net.SocketException - if the socket could not bind to the port or could not be opened

      • BroadcastServer

        public BroadcastServer(int port,
               java.net.InetAddress group,
               int delay)
                throws java.net.SocketException
        Construct a new BroadcastServer with the given port and address group. To start the message send call start(String).
        Parameters:
        port - the port to broadcast on
        group - the multicast address to use
        delay - the delay between sent messages in milliseconds
        Throws:
        java.net.SocketException - if the socket could not bind to the port or could not be opened
